```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#quick function for speed
ndis <- function(mean, sd) {
  round(rnorm(50, mean, sd), 1)
}
```

```{r}
#Setting random seed to get same numbers every time
set.seed(214)

numberset <- data.frame(matrix(data = NA, nrow = 50, ncol = 6))

numberset[1] <- ndis(20, 1)
numberset[2] <- ndis(20, 3)
numberset[3] <- ndis(40,1)
numberset[4] <- ndis(40, 5)
numberset[5] <- ndis(70, 1)
numberset[6] <- ndis(70, 8)
```

```{r}
numberset %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
